languages.text: "Мы поступим иначе: я дарую свою протекцию новой форме союза между ксеносами и представителями Человечества. Вместе мы уничтожим Вистенцу и ее сообщников, после чего люди и эльдары будут процветать на Янусе под моим патронажем!"

traits.locale_text: "Мы поступим иначе: я дарую свою протекцию новой форме союза между ксеносами и представителями Человечества. Вместе мы уничтожим Вистенцу и ее сообщников, после чего люди и эльдары будут процветать на Янусе под моим патронажем!"

languages.text: "We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"
languages.original_text: "Мы поступим иначе: я дарую свою протекцию новой форме союза между ксеносами и представителями Человечества. Вместе мы уничтожим Вистенцу и ее сообщников, после чего люди и эльдары будут процветать на Янусе под моим патронажем!"

traits.locale_text: "We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

"We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

"We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

"We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

languages.text: “咱们可以以另一种方法解决问题。我会对异形与人类代表之间的这种同盟形式给予庇护。我们可以一起消灭维丝坦萨与她的同伙。之后，人类与艾达灵族将会在我的庇护之下，一起带领加努斯走向繁荣昌盛！”
languages.original_text: "We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

traits.locale_text: “咱们可以以另一种方法解决问题。我会对异形与人类代表之间的这种同盟形式给予庇护。我们可以一起消灭维丝坦萨与她的同伙。之后，人类与艾达灵族将会在我的庇护之下，一起带领加努斯走向繁荣昌盛！”

languages.text: 「別のやり方を試してみよう。異種族と人類代表との間で結ばれた今の形の同盟を認める。共にヴィステンツァとその仲間を倒そう。そして{mf|俺|私}がパトロンとなり、人類とアエルダリは共にヤヌスで栄えようじゃないか！」
languages.original_text: "We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

traits.locale_text: 「別のやり方を試してみよう。異種族と人類代表との間で結ばれた今の形の同盟を認める。共にヴィステンツァとその仲間を倒そう。そして{mf|俺|私}がパトロンとなり、人類とアエルダリは共にヤヌスで栄えようじゃないか！」

languages.text: "Wir machen es anders: Ich gewähre dieser Allianz zwischen Xenos und Vertretern der Menschheit meinen Schutz. Gemeinsam vernichten wir Vistenza und ihre Partner, und dann können Menschen und Aeldari unter meiner Protektion auf Janus gedeihen!"
languages.original_text: "We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir machen es anders: Ich gewähre dieser Allianz zwischen Xenos und Vertretern der Menschheit meinen Schutz. Gemeinsam vernichten wir Vistenza und ihre Partner, und dann können Menschen und Aeldari unter meiner Protektion auf Janus gedeihen!"

languages.text: « Nous allons procéder autrement : j'accorderai ma protection à cette forme d'alliance entre les xénos et les représentants de l'humanité. Ensemble, nous anéantirons Vistenza et ses associés, puis les humains et les Aeldaris prospéreront sur Janus sous ma tutelle ! »
languages.original_text: "We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons procéder autrement : j'accorderai ma protection à cette forme d'alliance entre les xénos et les représentants de l'humanité. Ensemble, nous anéantirons Vistenza et ses associés, puis les humains et les Aeldaris prospéreront sur Janus sous ma tutelle ! »

languages.text: «Lo haremos de otro modo: otorgaré mi protección a esta alianza entre xenos y representantes de la Humanidad. ¡Juntos, destruiremos a Vistenza y sus secuaces, y así los humanos y los Aeldari prosperarán en Janus bajo mi guía!».
languages.original_text: "We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

traits.locale_text: «Lo haremos de otro modo: otorgaré mi protección a esta alianza entre xenos y representantes de la Humanidad. ¡Juntos, destruiremos a Vistenza y sus secuaces, y así los humanos y los Aeldari prosperarán en Janus bajo mi guía!».

languages.text: "Bu işi başka bir şekilde yapalım: Zenolarla İnsanlığın temsilcileri arasındaki bu ittifakı koruyacağım. Birlikte Vistenza'yı ve müttefiklerini itlaf edeceğiz. Ardından insanlar ve Aeldariler, Janus'ta himayem altında refaha erecek!"
languages.original_text: "We shall do things another way: I shall grant my protection to this form of alliance between xenos and representatives of Humanity. Together we shall destroy Vistenza and her associates, and then humans and Aeldari will flourish on Janus under my patronage!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu işi başka bir şekilde yapalım: Zenolarla İnsanlığın temsilcileri arasındaki bu ittifakı koruyacağım. Birlikte Vistenza'yı ve müttefiklerini itlaf edeceğiz. Ardından insanlar ve Aeldariler, Janus'ta himayem altında refaha erecek!"
